admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific
trustfund:
TF036673-SOUTH EAST ASIA REGION -
            EDUCATION PROJECTS (VIETNAM AND CAMBODIA),TF034279-VIETNAM - HIGHER EDUCATION AND
            CONSOLIDATION PROJECT,TF032762-VIETNAM - HIGHER EDUCATION
            CONSOLIDATION AND REFORM PROJECT,TF031574-VIETNAM - HIGHER EDUCATION CONSOLIDATION,TF031414-VIETNAM - HIGHER EDUCATION,TF029170-PHRD-HIGHER EDUC. CONSOLIDATION
            & REFORM PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Higher Education Project seeks to:
            a) increase coherence, flexibility, and responsiveness of
            higher education to the changing demands of society and the
            market economy; b) improve efficiency and resource
            utilization in higher education; and c) improve the quality
            of curriculum, teaching, learning, and research in higher
            education. The project consists of three components. The
            first component focuses on capacity building, institutional
            development, and computerization. In this component,
            system-level planning and coordination are targeted on the
            central agencies responsible for higher education.
            Institutional-level planning improvements are targeted to
            universities and other higher education institutions. The
            component will also support development of information
            technology in participating universities and higher
            education institutions. The second component will provide
            grants, on a competitive basis, to support quality
            improvements in selected qualifying higher education
            institutions and universities. The selected improvement
            programs will focus on teaching, learning, research, and
            institutional administration. The third component provides
            the essential coordination, implementation, procurement,
            contract management and accounting functions needed for
            project implementation.
